name: 彭馨儀
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
I.　　Syllabus
Week 1—Introduction
Week 2—Decisions in the Writing Process
Week 3—Planning the Essay (Part I)
Week 4—Planning the Essay (Part II)
Week 5—Drafting the Essay
Week 6—Revising the Essay
Week 7—Achieving Worthwhile Content (Part I)
Week 8—Achieving Worthwhile Content (Part II)
Week 9—Paragraphs
Week10—Sentence Style
Week11—Diction
Week12—Writing about Reading
Week13—Description and Narration (Part I)
Week14—Description and Narration (Part II)
Week15—Description and Narration (Part III)
Week16—Essay Revision
Week17—Course Review
Week18—End-of-Course Examination
scorePolicy:
Attendance and Class Participation—30%
Assignments—30%
End-of-Course Examination—40%
materials: Lannon, John M. The Writing Process: A Concise Rhetoric, Reader, and Handbook, 9th ed. Longman, 2007.
